posts.post_content:
Green Cobb PSA 4 (MK) for slight pencil mark in left margin
Sale pending. net to me, check or friends and family
If goods, add 3%
First to say I'll take it gets it over ongoing negotiations
Please ask any questions via pm.  
thanks
Eric

[IMG][URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/99rb5y9s][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/99rb5y9s.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/IMG]

[IMG][URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/je5345h0][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/je5345h0.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/IMG]
I know that PSA is going to call out any marking on a card but I wish they would have slabbed this one without the qualifier. That's a MK anyone can live with, beautiful card!

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1820744]I know that PSA is going to call out any marking on a call but I wish they would have slabbed this one without the qualifier. That's a MK anyone can live with, beautiful card![/QUOTE]

Thanks Tyler!  I totally agree.
